meanings.definition: Superlative form of schleppy: untidy or slovenly in appearance
meanings.sent1: She wore her schleppiest outfit to the party.
meanings.sent2: The room was a mess, with clothes strewn everywhere in their schleppiest state.
meanings.sent3: Even though it was a formal event, he showed up in his schleppiest attire.
meanings.sent4: Her hair looked like a bird's nest, truly the schleppiest I've ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The house was in such a schleppiest condition that even the dog seemed embarrassed.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of schleppy: lacking energy or enthusiasm
meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, she felt at her schleppiest.
meanings.sent2: The team's performance was at its schleppiest during the final minutes of the game.
meanings.sent3: His schleppiest mood always seemed to coincide with rainy days.
meanings.sent4: The party was lively, but he remained in his own schleppiest bubble.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was silent, the students looking their schleppiest on a Monday morning.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of schleppy: awkward or clumsy in movement
meanings.sent1: Carrying all those boxes, he felt like he was at his schleppiest.
meanings.sent2: The toddler's first steps were the cutest, yet the schleppiest.
meanings.sent3: Trying to dance salsa, he looked his schleppiest, stepping on toes left and right.
meanings.sent4: In the race, he tripped and fell, his movements the schleppiest of all.
meanings.sent5: The mime's performance was meant to be graceful, but it ended up being the schleppiest act of the night.
